item.title: About
item.content:
Meredith (Meri) served as a lawyer for students with special needs from 2005-2024. During her work she found that cranio sacral therapy, SomatoEmotion release and shamanic work was a surprisingly effective and efficient way of healing emotional trauma and calming the nervous system. Having a background working the children with special needs she decided to study the healing modalities.

In March 2000 Meri received a New York State License in Massage Therapy. She completed advanced training in cranio sacral therapy, SomatoEmotion Release, and Pediatrics at the Upledger International Institute from 2019-2025. She studied Dynamic Body Balancing with Susan Teiche in 2024. From 2016-2018 she completed 5 levels of training in cranio sacral therapy, SomatoEmotion release and Shamanic work with Natalie Kasdan and Annie Samojedney. She studied Reiki level III with Gretchen Avery in 1997. She completed a course in Visceral Manipulation with the Barral Institute in 2025.

Meri is currently in a 3 year Residential Program with The Foundation for Shamanic Studies. Prior to entering the program she completed various courses in core shamanism with the foundation.

Meri graduated with a B.S. "with Honors" from Cornell University in 1999 and obtained a J.D. from the University of California, Berkeley in 2004. Prior to entering law school, Meri completed a Fulbright Scholarship focusing on the study of disabilities and special education for which she received a Masters of Education in Special Education. Meri taught briefly in the New York City Public Schools and spent years as a camp counselor for students with special needs.
